page.description: Two new client-side events have been added to the List control.

case.title: onBeforePopulate
case.description: fires before the List is populated. Allows you to transform the data that will be used to populate the List. The event handler gets passed in 'data' - an array with all of the data for the List.

case.title: onPopulate
case.description: fires after the List has been populated.
